channel.title: [525] This pisses me off
channel.description:
Why the fuck do I keep getting this
[code]Exception in thread "GameEngine" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs2hd.model.Location.getLocalX(Location.java:41) at com.rs2hd.packetbuilder.PlayerUpdate.updateThisPlayerMovement(PlayerU pdate.java:129) at com.rs2hd.packetbuilder.PlayerUpdate.update(PlayerUpdate.java:35) at com.rs2hd.model.World.majorUpdate(World.java:219) at com.rs2hd.GameEngine.majorUpdate(GameEngine.java:110) at com.rs2hd.Server.processEvents(Server.java:164) at com.rs2hd.Server.go(Server.java:114) at com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:35) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
I already looked in the file I have no fucking idea, anyway I am getting dedi and I definatly don't want this

item.title: [525] This pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

dragonchain:

SHITFUCK, to fix it i had to restart everyone acc cuz they all got nulled, had to delete 523 players they gunna be pissed

Lol, I like you because you come here all pissed off, but you actually seem like you’re smart. So I think you’re funny lol
